abstract: I.B.M. is spending $300 million to build 13 data centers around the world, dedicated to helping corporate customers keep their businesses up and running despite power outages, natural disasters or political turmoil.
snippet: I.B.M. is spending $300 million to build 13 data centers around the world, dedicated to helping corporate customers keep their businesses up and running despite power outages, natural disasters or political turmoil.
lead_paragraph: I.B.M. is spending $300 million to build 13 data centers around the world, dedicated to helping corporate customers keep their businesses up and running despite power failures, natural disasters or political turmoil.

headline.main: I.B.M. Ups Its Bet on Business Recovery Services
